title: View or edit sold license
content:
This page explains how to view or edit a sold license record.

View or edit sold license 

  1. Click  > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Licenses.
  3. Locate the license you want to view or edit.  To filter the record list, click the Add filter  button. For more information, see Filters.
  4. Click the ID of the license. The license record has the following tabs. 
    Tab Description
    General Displays overview and details of the license. For more information, see the General section on this page.
    Workflow Displays the workflow metaphase and phase of the license. For more information, see the License workflow page.
    License Keys Displays details of any software keys which validates or activates the use of the software. For more information, see the License Keys section on this page.
    Finance Displays information about acquisition and connection to fixed assets, as well as expense lines. For more information, see the Finance section on this page.
    Discussions Displays any relevant conversations about the license. For more information, see the Discussions page.
    History Displays changes to the license record. For more information, see the History page.

  5. Click the tab you want to edit or view.

  6. Edit as required.

  7. Click Save on the toolbar to save your changes.

General 

The General tab has the following sections:

  • Overview
  • Details
  • Maintenance 
  • User list
  • Machine details
  • Covered product models
  • Attachments

Overview

Field Description
Display label The display label for the license.
License class The classification of license. It is set to Sold license by default for licenses added from the company management module.
Consumer company The company that purchased the software license.
Publisher The software publisher.
Owner The person who manages or monitors the software.
Quantity The number of licenses.
Unit rights

The number of authorized rights included in one license.

For example, an organization might buy 5 licenses (the Quantity) each of which allows 20 authorized users (the Unit Rights).
Total entitlements Total number of rights to install or use the licensed software according to the license.
Perpetual Select if the license is perpetual. If you select this option, the Start Date and End Date fields no longer apply.
Start date Start date for entitlement to use the software.
Note: Available when the license is a subscription.
End date End date for entitlement to use the software.
Note: Available when the license is a subscription.
Suite Select if the software is part of a bundled suite of software. 
Note: Available when the license is a perpetual one.
Edition The software edition, if applicable. For example, "Enterprise."
Version The software version.
OS type The type of operating system. For example, "Windows" or "UNIX."
OS name The name of the operating system.
Language The language of the software.

Located at location

This field can be used to track in which location the sold license is used.

Details 

Field Description
License contract The contract under which the license is provided.
Has node locking Select this field if the license is linked to a fixed node or machine.
Sold license type The category of the license based on its intended use. The available options are Development, Non production, Production, and Trial.
License based on
This field is related to the node locking setting.
Select how the node is identified. The available options are Hostname, IP address, and MAC address.
Description The description of the license.
1st level support The group assigned to support the license.
2nd level support The next level of escalation when an issue isn't resolved by the level 1 group.
3rd level support The final escalation level when an issue isn't resolved by the level 2 group.

Maintenance 

Field Description
Default maintenance contract The name of the maintenance contract for the license.
Maintenance end date The date the maintenance of the license ends. By default this field inherits the value from the default maintenance contract.

User list 

This section displays the end users who can use the license.

To add a user to the list:

  1. Click Add.
  2. Select the user(s). The added user records appear in yellow.
  3. Click OK.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

To remove a user from the list:

  1. Click anywhere on the user record (except the ID) that you want to remove. The record is highlighted in grey.
  2. Click Remove.  A strikethrough appears across the entire record, marking it for removal.
  3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 for all users you want to remove.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

Machine details

This section allows you to specify the details of the machines to which the license is locked. You can provide the machine's hostname, IP address, or MAC address.

To add machine details:

  1. Click New.
  2. Select the detail type from the Type dropdown. The available options are: Hostname, IP address, MAC address.
  3. Enter the value in the Value box.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.
To delete machine details:
  1. Click the detail record you want to delete. The record is highlighted in gray.
  2. Click Delete.
  3. Click Save on the toolbar.

Covered product models

This section displays the product models covered under the license.

To add a product model to the list:

  1. Click Add.
  2. Select the product model(s). The added product model records appear in yellow.
  3. Click OK.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

To remove a product model from the list:

  1. Click anywhere on the product model record (except the ID) that you want to remove. The record is highlighted in gray.
  2. Click Remove. A strikethrough appears across the entire record, marking it for removal.
  3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 for all product models you want to remove.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

Attachments

Click Add attachment if you want to attach a file to the record.

License keys

You can add, edit, or delete license keys.

To add a license key:

  1. Click Add. The License key dialog box appears.
  2. Enter the license key in the License key box.
  3. Click Add.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

To edit a license key:

  1. Click the license key you want to edit. The record is highlighted in blue.
  2. Click Edit. The License key dialog box appears.
  3. Edit the License key field and click Apply.
  4. Click Save on the toolbar.

To delete a license key:

  1. Click the license key you want to edit. The record is highlighted in blue.
  2. Click Delete.
  3. Click Save on the toolbar.

Finance

The Finance tab has the following sections:

  • Acquisition
  • Expense lines

Acquisition 

Field Description
Acquisition type The type of acquisition. For example, purchase or lease.
Acquisition date The date of the acquisition.
Acquisition end date The date when the acquisition ends. For example, the end of the lease.
Total amount The amount paid to acquire the license.
Currency The currency of the amount paid.
Tax rate (%) The applicable tax rate.
Payment terms When the payment is contractually due.
Payment date The actual date of payment.
External PO number The relevant purchase order number.
Invoice number The invoice number for the license.

Expense lines

Displays the expense lines generated or created for the license.
